title: ad hoc attacks
extract: Ad-Hoc Connection Attack. Ad-Hoc Connection attacks are very nasty type of attacks, where the attacker (malicious user) is using a 3rd party legitimate user as an additional hop or man-in-the-middle between attacker's device and AP or other type of gateways.
extract_html: Ad-Hoc Connection Attack. Ad-Hoc Connection attacks are very nasty type of attacks, where the attacker (malicious user) is using a 3rd party legitimate user as an additional hop or man-in-the-middle between attacker's device and AP or other type of gateways.
